page.title: 13THE JAMISON FARM
page.content: {THE JAMISON FARM Jamisons have been farming at their present farm for{140 years.}They originally leased the land from the McNaughtons & they bought it from them in the early part of the 20th century under the Land Purchase Act.Mr.& Mrs. Jamison jnr.& their{4 children}have lived in the{main farmhouse;Kirkestown since Mr.Jamison took over the management of the farm & Mrs.Jamison snr.now lives in a bungalow which was built recently on the farm.The Jamisons own{70 acres}of land which is divided into{7 fields}&they rent more land.One field is used to grow{barley & the others are used for growing {silage}or for{grazing}for their {Friesian}dairy herd.They have{66 milking cows.They are milked twice a day &the milk is collected in{tankers at{8 o'clock}every morning.
